content.rendered:
Home

EU Students

Here at Regent College London, we offer an inclusive environment to everyone who wishes to become a student with us. We take pride in teaching students from all over Europe and will continue to do the same for you. We understand it can be a challenge studying in a different country, but we’re here to help. We offer guidance through every step of your Regent College London journey, from the application process to applying for Student Finance, we are here to help.

For entry requirements please select your country:

  • Albania
  • Austria
  • Belgium
  • Bulgaria
  • Croatia
  • Cyprus
  • Czech Republic
  • Denmark
  • Estonia
  • Finland
  • France
  • Germany
  • Greece
  • Hungary
  • Iceland
  • Ireland
  • Italy
  • Latvia

  • Moldova
  • Netherlands
  • Norway
  • Poland
  • Portugal
  • Romania
  • Russia
  • Slovakia
  • Slovenia
  • Sweden
  • Ukraine
  • United Kingdom
